title: Shy Velvet Women's Summer Dress Square Neck Short Sleeves Crossover Waist Casual Party Mini Dress
description: Material: 100% Cotton, this summer dress is made of soft contton fabric, which is lightweight and breathable, sweat-resistant and no irritation, soft, and comfortable to wear.

Design: Flared mini sleeve, Square Neck, Shirred back,Tiered detailing on skirt . A-line design, Mini dress, Short sleeves dress, skater dress, party dress, casual dress.you can get two totally diffetent looks,If you prefer a more sexy look, you can wear it as an off-the-shoulder dress.

Sweet and effortless, features a sweetheart neckline and exaggerated sleeves with cutout detailing at the bodice for added shape.Tiered silhouette/Smocked crossover waistband/Low back design/Pull-on style

Formal/Casual Occasions: Semi-formal Mini Dress perfect for any occasion in all seasons,casual daily,business work wear;club,cocktail,evening,shopping,camping,vacation,beach,leisure wear; pool party,wedding guest,dates, graduation dress wear. Ideal and awesome gift for women!
Wash recommended with cold water/Do not bleach/Hang or line dry/Separate from other clothes to avoid dyeing.
